animeTitle: Guitar wo Motta Shounen: Kikaider vs. Inazuman
animeDescription: The OVA Special which teams the Anime version of the legendary Henshin Hero Jiro/Jinzou Ningen Kikaider with another Toei Henshin Hero Inazuman.
